Kembali: You did not sign in correctly or your account is temporarily disabled.

Kembali: Your password must be at least %1 characters.

Kembali: Kata sandi anda harus menyertakan karakter numerik dan abjad.

Kembali: Your password confirmation must match your password.

Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.

Kembali: Jika anda meminta perubahan ini, atur ulang kata sandi anda disini:

Back: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
Kembali: Jika anda tidak mengajukan permintaan ini, anda dapat mengabaikan email ini dan sandi anda akan tetap sama.
